alert.note: Alert for Charles City; New Kent (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 9:39PM EST until further notice by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Chickahominy River above Providence Forge affecting New Kent and Charles City Counties. South Anna River near Ashland affecting Hanover County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Chickahominy River above Providence Forge. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.5 feet, Water is up to 1 FT deep in the garages of an auto parts business along Adkins Rd about 1/2 miles south of the river gauge. Parts of Adkins Rd begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 9.6 feet. - Bankfull stage is 8.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:45 PM EST Wednesday was 9.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise slightly through tonight and may approach moderate flood by the morning hours Thursday. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 9.8 feet on 09/30/2016. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning at 945 AM EST.
